messages.title: VOTE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: It has been a huge privilege to be the Conservative Candidate for Penistone & Stocksbridge these last three years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign to campaign for greater investment in our roads and pavements.
Work hard to help reduce the unacceptable levels of anti-social behaviour and violent crime in our community.
Demand greater investment in playgrounds and youth facilities for our young people across the constituency.
Fight to support the creation of new jobs for local people in our region's economy.

issues.health: We will protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been a huge privilege to be the Conservative Candidate for Penistone & Stocksbridge these last three years. As a parent of three young children, my wife and I know only too well the struggles of family life in today's world. It's not easy balancing the pressures of our modern society and trying to ensure that our children are brought up with the right values.

quotes.text: This can be the year for change â€“ and the Conservatives have the plans to make that a reality.

images.caption: Spencer Pitfield is pictured with local families, highlighting his focus on community and values.
